title: Citi Smith Barney Logo
content:
Just looking for the "Smith Barney" part of the logo.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130516164529im_/http:/typophile.com/files/smithbarney_4264.gif)
author: cslem1

comments.content:
Looks like Interstate from Font Bureau.

- Lex

The smith barney has thinner strokes, and has wider counters. Especially in the A and B. Is there another version?

courtney
I would agree with Lex. As far as I know it's based on Interstate. They may have tweaked/customized it for the logo.
